# The `ExtraLoopPassManager` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A pass manager to run a set of extra loop passes if the MarkerTy analysis is present. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;typename MarkerTy&gt;
class llvm::ExtraLoopPassManager&lt;MarkerTy&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A pass manager to run a set of extra loop passes if the MarkerTy analysis is present.

This allows passes to request additional transformations on demand. An example is doing additional runs of SimpleLoopUnswitch.

Definition at line 82 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/extrapassmanager-h">ExtraPassManager.h</a>.
